name: Blogger-to-WordPress-Migration
short_description:
CMS2CMS is an automated CMS and forum migration service allows to convert your website from Blogger to WordPress in a few minutes accurately and quickly. This service totally automates your data transfer and does not require technical skills or knowledge. 

CMS2CMS includes the migration of the following items:
 - pages
 - posts
 - comments 
 - tags
 - content images
 - SEO URLs
 - internal links

Also, it's possible to try absolutely free demo migration. Generally, Blogger to WordPress takes approximately 15 minutes in accordance to the amount of your site items. 

As far as, CMS2CMS is a web-base service, you are able to observe the migration procedure right in your browser window.
summary: CMS2CMS Automated Blogger to WordPress Migration Service
